Articles.Content:
\*Crowd explodes into cheers\*

Steam! Woot woop!
Yayayayayayay!!!!!
Finally! I will get some bad grades at school i think ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Yep! I've already begun the update. Will wait a bit later, then get to play while watching the SpaceX launch. Appropriate!
\*starts up Steam in the middle of work\*
![giphy.gif](http://media0.giphy.com/media/rl0FOxdz7CcxO/giphy.gif)
still waiting for the ksp site to go up here.

No steam update for me, even after restarting steam.

Restarting computer

YEEEEEEHA!

\*warps off of hypetrain\*
Must...download....faster. Maybe if I rub cheetah blood on my router...

> 
> No steam update for me, even after restarting steam.
> Restarting computer

Tryt accidentially starting KSP/
What's here? If you mean KSP 1.0...I'm still getting the Server Migration screen.
Game is launching !
OLaunching now!

> 
> What's here? If you mean KSP 1.0...I'm still getting the Server Migration screen.

They seem to have shafted non steam users......

> 
> Tryt accidentially starting KSP/

I have, didn't work.

1.0 YAY!

Bob and bill still have holes in their cheeks, whats up with that?

> 
> [http://media0.giphy.com/media/rl0FOxdz7CcxO/giphy.gif](http://media0.giphy.com/media/rl0FOxdz7CcxO/giphy.gif)

Yep...

Argh! I haven't done all the other things I need to do tonight yet! D:

But... Kerbal 1.0... cannot... resist...

> 
> They seem to have shafted non steam users......

nah, steam users deserve some love. they get the short end of the stick most of the time.
Hey, took less than 30 seconds from clicking to start screen. Nice.
Update at 50%!
Move the discussion over to the [1.0 Grand Discussion thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116772-The-KSP-1-0-Grand-Discussion-Thread-Conquering-Space-Was-Never-This-Easy%21), please.
